ApexOrgWideCoverage.name: ApexOrgWideCoverage
ApexOrgWideCoverage.description: Represents code coverage test results for an entire organization.

PercentCovered.description: The percentage of the code in the organization that is covered by tests.

ApexOrgWideCoverage.accessRules: In API version 49.0 and later, users must have the View Setup and Configuration permission to access this object.
